ANU.name: Peter Hendriks
interest: Peter specialises in the history of Japanese language, the history of  Japanese dialects, historical syntax and morphology, and acquisition of Japanese  as a second language.

publication.title: Kakari Particles and the Merger of the Predicative and Attributive Forms in Old Japanese
publication.source: in Smith, J; Bentley, D (ed.), Historical Linguistics, 1995: General Issues and Non-Germanic Languages.
